channel.title: NpcHandler
channel.description:
Hello.
I recently started work on my NPCHandler class, im using a Devo base and wish to ask a few things;
Could anyone please post what some of the booleans etc mean, i need to know:
- player is attacking npc
If you could tell me any others that would be appreciated.
Thanks.
[u][b]EDIT:[/b][/u] [i]Got them, no worries anymore.[/i]
